description:
Balgo is a student at South Braxton School and is Noel`s senior. He has an easy-going personality and is infatuated by Noel, although she does not feel the same way about him. He dotes on Osushi Chan. Balgo became "Dragon Possessed" after he was bitten by his childhood friend Shelby. Shelby is a Disguiser (a dragon impersonating a human) who died in a car accident 10 years ago. Balgo also has the constitution to powerfully attract other dragons, an important trait of dragon possession. Balgo is currently living in Reverse London under the protection of Ninny and Noel.
Source: Official English Website
name: Balgo Ywain Parks
